name: It's A Racing Game
description:
This IS a racing game.
This is an ONLINE racing game.
There are many games like it, but this one is mine.

There are cars to drive and tracks to drive on. There are sometimes things to look at on these tracks.
Let's be serious here. It's a racing game. It was designed for ONLINE MULTIPLAYER so smashing into your friends and ruining their day is kind of expected.

Current Features:
4 Cars
4 Tracks
Online Multiplayer
Up to 10 players per lobby
Single Player Time Trial Mode
